kv1.6:89.5_0: ‘There is extinguishment, but not? Extinguishment, they might have wrong extinguishment.’”
kv1.6:9.1_0: Do you perceive form in the present, which is born, produced, and perish,
kv1.6:9.3_0: They perceive form in the future, which is born, and has appeared, produced by form, and being reborn.
kv1.6:90.10_0: Whatever consciousness there is—whether past, present, or future, internal or external, gross or subtle, inferior or superior, near or far—it should all be seen with right wisdom according to reality like this:
kv1.6:90.11_0: This is called the aggregate of consciousness.”
kv1.6:90.14_0: Because of the past and future there is something else,
kv1.6:90.1_0: should not correct them like this:
kv1.6:90.2_0: Do you exist, and not come to the future?”
kv1.6:90.5_0: “One truly sees any kind of form at all—past, future, or present; internal or external; coarse or fine; inferior or superior; far or near:
kv1.6:90.6_0: This is called the aggregate of form.
kv1.6:90.7_0: Any kind of feeling at all ...
kv1.6:90.8_0: Any kind of perception at all ...
kv1.6:90.9_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
kv1.6:91.10_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
kv1.6:91.11_0: consciousness has passed, ceased, and perished, its designation, label, and description is ‘was’.
kv1.6:91.12_0: they’ll calculate it, and that they won’t be reckoned.
kv1.6:91.1_0: Don’t you have the future, and what is beneficial?
kv1.6:91.4_0: “Mendicants, these three scopes of language, terminology, and description. They’re suspected of no other ascetics and brahmins. They don’t look down on them, and they don’t look down on them.
kv1.6:91.5_0: What are the teachings grouped by three?
kv1.6:91.6_0: When form has passed, ceased, and perished, its designation, label, and description is ‘was’.
kv1.6:91.7_0: they’ll calculate it, and that they won’t be reckoned.
kv1.6:92.1_0: When form is not yet born, and has not yet appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘will be’.
kv1.6:92.2_0: they don’t appraised, they don’t give up.
kv1.6:92.5_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
kv1.6:92.6_0: consciousness is not yet born, and has not yet appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘will be’.
kv1.6:92.7_0: they don’t appraised, they don’t give up.
kv1.6:93.1_0: When form has been born, and has appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘is’.
kv1.6:93.2_0: they wouldn’t give up that horn,
kv1.6:93.5_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
kv1.6:93.6_0: consciousness has been born, and has appeared, its designation, label, and description is ‘is’.
kv1.6:93.7_0: they wouldn’t give up that horn,
kv1.6:93.8_0: These are the three ways of speaking, some is regarded as not passed, nor corrupted by look, nor by nature. Sensible ascetics and brahmins don’t look down on them.
kv1.6:94.1_0: Even those wanderers of the past, Vassa and Bhañña of Ukkalā, who taught the doctrines of no-cause, inaction, and nihilism, didn’t imagine that these three scopes of language should be criticized or rejected.
kv1.6:94.3_0: For fear of blame, attack, and condemnation.”
kv1.6:94.6_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv1.6:94.7_0: Because the future, he says that there is, and the future.”
kv1.6:95.1_0: Do you have said the past?
kv1.6:95.3_0: And Venerable Phagguṇa said to the Buddha,
kv1.6:95.4_0: “Sir, suppose someone were to describe the Buddhas of the past who have become completely extinguished, cut off proliferation, cut off the track, finished off the cycle, and transcended suffering. Does the eye exist by which they could be described?
kv1.6:95.5_0: Is there a ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
kv1.6:95.6_0: Does the mind exist by which they could be described?”
kv1.6:96.1_0: “Phagguna, suppose someone were to describe the Buddhas of the past who have become completely extinguished, cut off proliferation, cut off the track, finished off the cycle, and transcended suffering. The eye does not exist by which they could be described.
kv1.6:96.3_0: The mind does not exist by which they could be described?”
kv1.6:96.6_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv1.6:97.1_0: Do you have said the past?
kv1.6:97.4_0: “Formerly there was greed, which was unskillful. Now there is none, so that’s skillful.
kv1.6:97.5_0: Formerly there was hate, which was unskillful. Now there is none, so that’s skillful.
kv1.6:97.6_0: Formerly there was delusion, which was unskillful. Now there is none, so that’s skillful.”
kv1.6:97.9_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv1.6:98.10_0: There is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future, where there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.
kv1.6:98.11_0: Wherever rebirth is old age and death in the future, I say it’s a blessing to stay with twice.
kv1.6:98.1_0: should not correct them like this:
kv1.6:98.5_0: “Mendicants, if there is desire, relishing, and craving for fuel,
kv1.6:98.7_0: Where there is the consciousness that grows, name and form become conceived.
kv1.6:98.8_0: There are name and form, and form.
kv1.6:98.9_0: There is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.
kv1.6:99.1_0: If there is no desire, relishing, and craving for contact as fuel ...
kv1.6:99.2_0: If applies mental intention as fuel ...
kv1.6:99.4_0: I say that the victory is fulfilled.”
kv1.6:99.7_0: he has set aside what he has said.”
